snippet.title: Virtua Striker 2 Longplay (Dreamcast Version) - As Italy - Difficulty: Hardest
snippet.description:
- Virtua Striker 2 Longplay (Dreamcast Version) - As Italy - Difficulty: Hardest -

I did love it back in the day, but I would lie if I said that it has aged well... :-( Glad that I beat it again, anyway.
Ps. Apologies for the video quality. I used a different capture card, and I guess I need to tweak something, lol...

For more videos like this, please subscribe to our channel.

If you want to know more about this soccer game, please check this out: https://retrogamingloft.com/top-10-retro-soccer-games-kicking-through-the-decades-part-1
